# Website Requirements
1. Must be hosted via simple HTML, JavaScript, CSS.
2. Must provide information. This can be sourced from Wikipedia upon request.
3. This website should offer five or more pages. All pages should have the same navigation bar, and all pages should be accessible through the navigation bar. These pages will, in the future, be hosted like `/home` `/second-page` `/third-page`, etc.
4. This website will be bird themed. You will decide what the purpose of the website will be, but it should be informational. The website should feature these birds in some way: Javan Myna, Common Pigeon, Zebra Dove, House Crow, and Eurasian Tree Sparrow. These are the birds of Singapore.
5. The style of the website should be modern and sleek. If you do not have any information to source for wikipedia, use Lorem Ipsum text instead.
